meanings.definition: Put forward (an idea or plan) for consideration.
meanings.sent1: I propose we have a picnic in the park this weekend.
meanings.sent2: She proposed a new project to improve efficiency at work.
meanings.sent3: The cat proposed a plan to catch the elusive mouse.
meanings.sent4: The sunflower proposed its bright petals to the sky.
meanings.sent5: The teacher proposed a fun game to teach math concepts.

meanings.sent1: He proposed to his girlfriend on a beautiful beach.
meanings.sent2: She was surprised when he proposed during dinner.
meanings.sent3: The penguin proposed to its mate with a shiny pebble.
meanings.sent4: The moon proposed to the night with a blanket of stars.
meanings.sent5: The prince proposed to the princess with a golden ring.

meanings.sent1: I propose to finish my homework before dinner.
meanings.sent2: She proposes to start a new exercise routine next week.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel proposed to gather nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent4: The river proposed to flow gracefully towards the sea.
meanings.sent5: The chef proposed to create a delicious new recipe.
